amendment.description: Amendment redirects $5,000,000 in funds to be used specifically study the impact of firearm violence in elementary and secondary schools and higher education institutions.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 49 printed in Part B of House Report 116-109 to increase and decrease by $5,000,000 for fund to be used specifically study the impact of firearm violence in elementary and secondary schools and higher education institutions.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Maloney, Sean amendment (A047) Agreed to by recorded vote: 266 - 150 (Roll no. 296).

action.text: Amendment (A047) offered by Mr. Maloney, Sean.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
